Package gui.Board

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Players
    Interface for the player and opponents panels.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackCardPanel
    A panel to display the backside of a card.
    BoardFrame
    A Frame to keep all the panels of the board.
    BoardPanel
    A panel to display the board.
    FrontCardPanel
    A panel to display the front of a card.
    Gui
    A class to create the board-gui.
    OpponentPanel
    A panel to display the opponents cards.
    PlayerPanel
    A panel to display the players cards.
    ProgressPanel
    A panel to display the amount of cards and spades the player has.
    ScoreboardPanel
    A panel to display score.
